trans-unit.source: Represents the Japanese calendar.
trans-unit.target: 表示日本历。

trans-unit.source: The Japanese calendar, which is also known as the Wareki calendar, works exactly like the Gregorian calendar, except that the year and era are different.
trans-unit.target: 日语日历，这是也称为 Wareki 日历，工作方式与公历，完全相同，只的年份和纪元不相同。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about using the JapaneseCalendar class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在.NET Framework 中使用 JapaneseCalendar 类和其他日历类的信息，请参阅[使用日历](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Japanese calendar recognizes one era for every emperor's reign.
trans-unit.target: 日语日历识别为每个皇帝 reign 一个纪元。

trans-unit.source: The current era is the Heisei era, which began in the Gregorian calendar year 1989.
trans-unit.target: 当前纪元是平成纪元，始于公历 1989 年。

trans-unit.source: The era name is typically displayed before the year.
trans-unit.target: 纪元名称通常会显示在年的前面。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Gregorian calendar year 2001 is the Japanese calendar year Heisei 13.
trans-unit.target: 例如，公历 2001 年为日语日历年平成 13。

trans-unit.source: Note that the first year of an era is called "Gannen."
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一年的纪元称为"元年。"

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the Gregorian calendar year 1989 was the Japanese calendar year Heisei Gannen.
trans-unit.target: 因此，公历 1989 年的日语日历平成元年。

trans-unit.source: This class assigns numbers to the eras as follows: |GetEra value|Era Name|Era Abbreviation|Gregorian Dates| |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| |4|平成 (Heisei)|平 (H, h)|January 8, 1989 to present| |3|昭和 (Showa)|昭 (S, s)|December 25, 1926 to January 7, 1989| |2|大正 (Taisho)|大 (T, t)|July 30, 1912 to December 24, 1926| |1|明治 (Meiji)|明 (M, m)|September 8, 1868 to July 29, 1912| This class handles dates from September 8 in the year Meiji 1 (in the Gregorian calendar, September 8, 1868).
Although the Japanese calendar was switched from a lunar calendar to a solar calendar in the year Meiji 6 (1873 of the Gregorian calendar), this implementation is based on the solar calendar only.
trans-unit.target: 尽管日本历切换从阴历太阳能日历年明治 6 (1873 的公历) 中，此实现基于太阳能日历。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 闰年日语日历中对应于为公历日历中的相同闰年。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 闰年公历日历中定义为公历年份整除的由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的公历年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: The Japanese calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: |GetMonth value|Month|English|Days in common years|Days in leap years| |--------------------|-----------|-------------|--------------------------|------------------------| |1|1月 (Ichigatsu)|January|31|31| |2|2月 (Nigatsu)|February|28|29| |3|3月 (Sangatsu)|March|31|31| |4|4月 (Shigatsu)|April|30|30| |5|5月 (Gogatsu)|May|31|31| |6|6月 (Rokugatsu)|June|30|30| |7|7月 (Shichigatsu)|July|31|31| |8|8月 (Hachigatsu)|August|31|31| |9|9月 (Kugatsu)|September|30|30| |10|10月 (Juugatsu)|October|31|31| |11|11月 (Juuichigatsu)|November|30|30| |12|12月 (Juunigatsu)|December|31|31| Nigatsu, which is equivalent to the Gregorian calendar month of February, has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years.
The date January 1, 2001 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 日期到公元 2001 年 1 月 1 日

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the first day of Ichigatsu in the year Heisei 13 in the Japanese calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历中相当 Ichigatsu 日语日历中每年平成 13 中的第一天。

trans-unit.source: If the application is using the JapaneseCalendar class, <xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> recognizes the era abbreviations in front of the year.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序使用 JapaneseCalendar 类，<xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>识别年份前面的纪元缩写。</xref:System.DateTime.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The abbreviation is either the single-character case-insensitive Latin alphabet abbreviation or the single-character Kanji abbreviation.
trans-unit.target: 缩写是单字符不区分大小写拉丁字母缩写或单字符日文汉字缩写。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object supports a set of calendars.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象支持一组的日历。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>属性返回区域性的默认日历和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>属性返回一个包含所有支持的区域性的日历数组。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the calendar used by a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, the application should set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to a new <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，应用程序应设置此<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>属性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>为新的<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>。</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>的日历

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Unable to initialize a <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> object because of missing culture information.
trans-unit.target: 无法初始化<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>由于缺少区域性信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> that is the specified number of months away from the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个<xref:System.DateTime>，它是指定的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>离开的月数</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The year part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>如果外部的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>年，则结果月份影响</xref:System.DateTime>生成的年份部分

trans-unit.source: The era part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>如果结果年份是外部的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>纪元影响</xref:System.DateTime>生成的纪元数值部分

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 时间的日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>与指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>相同</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified month is Juugatsu (October), which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and `months` is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Shigatsu (April), and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in Shigatsu (April).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定的月份是 Juugatsu （年 10 月），有 31 天，则指定的日期是该月第 31 天和`months`为 6，则结果年份是一个超过指定的年份，结果月份是 Shigatsu （年 4 月） 和结果的日期是 30 日，即 Shigatsu （年 4 月） 的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: If `months` is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`months`为负，<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.DateTime>生成

trans-unit.source: The<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性的返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，如以下示例所示。</xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.j_17_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.j_17_1.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.j_17_1.vb)][!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5 ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.j_17_1.cs)]

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to which to add months.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>向其添加月数。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的月份数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>添加指定的月数到指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>而产生</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.DateTime>超出支持的范围。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: months is less than -120000.
trans-unit.target: months小于-120000。

trans-unit.source: -or- months is greater than 120000.
trans-unit.target: -或-months大于 120000。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> that is the specified number of years away from the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个<xref:System.DateTime>，它是指定的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>离开的年数</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The month part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 月部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>与指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>相同</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The era part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>如果结果年份是外部的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>纪元影响</xref:System.DateTime>生成的纪元数值部分

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 时间的日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>与指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>相同</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For example, Nigatsu (February) has 28 days except during leap years when it has 29 days.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Nigatsu （年 2 月） 具有 28 天除外，在闰年时它有 29 天。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date is the 29th day of Nigatsu (February) in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of Nigatsu (February) in the following year.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是闰年和的值的 Nigatsu （年 2 月） 29 日`years`为 1，则得到的日期将在下一年的 28 天的 Nigatsu （年 2 月）。

trans-unit.source: If `years` is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`years`为负，<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime></xref:System.DateTime>生成

trans-unit.source: The<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性的返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，如以下示例所示。</xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.j_14_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.j_14_1.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.j_14_1.vb)][!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8 ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.j_14_1.cs)]

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to which to add years.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>向其添加年。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的年份数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that results from adding the specified number of years to the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>添加指定的到指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>的年数而产生</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.DateTime>超出支持的范围。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: time is outside the supported range of the type.
trans-unit.target: time超出了支持的范围类型。

trans-unit.source: -or- years is less than -10,000 or greater than 10,000.
trans-unit.target: -或-years小于-10000 或大于 10000。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前日历是阳历、 阴历还是二者的组合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref href="System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref href="System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of eras in the <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取中的纪元列表<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Japanese calendar recognizes one era for every emperor's reign.
trans-unit.target: 日语日历识别为每个皇帝 reign 一个纪元。

trans-unit.source: The current era is the Heisei era, which began in the Gregorian calendar year 1989.
trans-unit.target: 当前纪元是平成纪元，始于公历 1989 年。

trans-unit.source: The era name is typically displayed before the year.
trans-unit.target: 纪元名称通常会显示在年的前面。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Gregorian calendar year 2001 is the Japanese calendar year Heisei 13.
trans-unit.target: 例如，公历 2001 年为日语日历年平成 13。

trans-unit.source: Note that the first year of an era is called "Gannen."
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一年的纪元称为"元年。"

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the Gregorian calendar year 1989 was the Japanese calendar year Heisei Gannen.
trans-unit.target: 因此，公历 1989 年的日语日历平成元年。

trans-unit.source: This class assigns numbers to the eras as follows: |GetEra value|Era Name|Era Abbreviation|Gregorian Dates| |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| |4|平成 (Heisei)|平 (H, h)|January 8, 1989 to present| |3|昭和 (Showa)|昭 (S, s)|December 25, 1926 to January 7, 1989| |2|大正 (Taisho)|大 (T, t)|July 30, 1912 to December 24, 1926| |1|明治 (Meiji)|明 (M, m)|September 8, 1868 to July 29, 1912| This class handles dates from September 8 in the year Meiji 1 (January 1, 1868 of the Gregorian calendar).
Although the Japanese calendar was switched from a lunar calendar to a solar calendar in the year Meiji 6 (1873 of the Gregorian calendar), this implementation is based on the solar calendar only.
trans-unit.target: 尽管日本历切换从阴历太阳能日历年明治 6 (1873 的公历) 中，此实现基于太阳能日历。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Should additional eras be added in the future, applications may encounter more than the expected four eras for the Japanese calendar.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 应在将来添加其他纪元，应用程序可能会遇到多个预期为日语日历的四个纪元。

trans-unit.source: Applications should be tested to ensure that they continue to work in such an event; see [Era Handling for the Japanese Calendar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=239618).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应进行测试，以确保它们持续这种情况下; 中的工作请参阅[纪元处理为日语日历](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=239618)。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers that represents the eras in the <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的纪元的整数的数组<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>中的每月天数

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day of the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 31 之间的整数，表示在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>每月的某

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the week in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>星期几

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DayOfWeek> values are as follows: |DayOfWeek value|which indicates| |---------------------|---------------------| |Sunday|日曜日 (Nichiyoubi)| |Monday|月曜日 (Getsuyoubi)| |Tuesday|火曜日 (Kayoubi)| |Wednesday|水曜日 (Suiyoubi)| |Thursday|木曜日 (Mokuyoubi)| |Friday|金曜日 (Kinyoubi)| |Saturday|土曜日 (Doyoubi)|
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DayOfWeek>值如下: |DayOfWeek 值 | 指示 | |---------------------|---------------------| |星期日 | 日曜日 (Nichiyoubi) | |星期一 | 月曜日 (Getsuyoubi) | |星期二 | 火曜日 (Kayoubi) | |星期三 | 水曜日 (Suiyoubi) | |星期四 | 木曜日 (Mokuyoubi) | |星期五 | 金曜日 (Kinyoubi) | |星期六 | 土曜日 (Doyoubi) |</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek> value that represents the day of the week in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.DayOfWeek>值，它表示日期中的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>星期几</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>年的某一天

trans-unit.source: The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 每年的日期被指从该年度的第一天的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, GetDayOfYear for the first day of the first month returns 1, and GetDayOfYear for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value as that returned by <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，第一个月的第一天的 GetDayOfYear 返回 1，和上个月的最后一天的 GetDayOfYear 这一年，这是相同的值返回的<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>.</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>返回总天数

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 和 366 之间的整数，表示的年份中的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>的第一天

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中的指定年份的指定月份的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 28 or 29 for Nigatsu (February, `month` = 2), depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法为 Nigatsu 返回 28 或 29 (年 2 月， `month` = 2)，具体取决于`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元中的指定年份中指定的月份的天数。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中指定年份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 365 or 366, depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法返回 365 或 366，具体取决于是否`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元中的指定年份的天数。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns the era in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>纪元

trans-unit.source: The Japanese calendar recognizes one era for every emperor's reign.
trans-unit.target: 日语日历识别为每个皇帝 reign 一个纪元。

trans-unit.source: The current era is the Heisei era, which began in the Gregorian calendar year 1989.
trans-unit.target: 当前纪元是平成纪元，始于公历 1989 年。

trans-unit.source: The era name is typically displayed before the year.
trans-unit.target: 纪元名称通常会显示在年的前面。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Gregorian calendar year 2001 is the Japanese calendar year Heisei 13.
trans-unit.target: 例如，公历 2001 年为日语日历年平成 13。

trans-unit.source: Note that the first year of an era is called "Gannen."
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一年的纪元称为"元年。"

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the Gregorian calendar year 1989 was the Japanese calendar year Heisei Gannen.
trans-unit.target: 因此，公历 1989 年的日语日历平成元年。

trans-unit.source: This class assigns numbers to the eras as follows: |GetEra value|Era Name|Era Abbreviation|Gregorian Dates| |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| |4|平成 (Heisei)|平 (H, h)|January 8, 1989 to present| |3|昭和 (Showa)|昭 (S, s)|December 25, 1926 to January 7, 1989| |2|大正 (Taisho)|大 (T, t)|July 30, 1912 to December 24, 1926| |1|明治 (Meiji)|明 (M, m)|September 8, 1868 to July 29, 1912| Ordinarily, the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar> class supports dates from September 8 in the year Meiji 1 (September 8, 1868 of the Gregorian calendar), which is the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此类将分配数字向纪元，如下所示: |GetEra 值 |纪元名称 |纪元缩写 |公历日期 | |------------------|--------------|----------------------|---------------------| | 4 | 平成 （平成） | 平 (H，h) |年 1 月 8，1989 呈现 | | 3 | 昭和 (Showa) | 昭 （S、 s） |1926 年 12 月 25，1989 年 1 月 7 日到 | | 2 | 大正 (Taisho) | 大 （T、 t） |1912 年 7 月 30 日到 1926 年 12 月 24，| | 1 | 明治 （明治） | 明 （M、 m） |1868 年 9 月 8 日至 1912 年 7 月 29 日 | 通常，<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>类支持在年明治 1 (年 9 月 8，1868 公历)，即的值从 9 月 8 日期的<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A>属性。</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>

trans-unit.source: However, the GetEra method successfully returns the era for dates from January 1 through September 7 in the year Meiji 1 (January 1, 1868 through September 7, 1868 in the Gregorian calendar).
trans-unit.target: 但是，GetEra 方法成功返回日期纪元从到 9 月 7 日明治 1 年 1 月 1 日 (1868 年 1 月 1，通过 1868 在公历日历年 9 月 7 日)。

trans-unit.source: For dates earlier than January 1, 1868 in the Gregorian calendar, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 对于早于 1868 年 1 月 1 日公历日期，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>异常。</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>纪元

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref:System.DateTime>超出支持的范围。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定的年和纪元的闰月。

trans-unit.source: In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year.
trans-unit.target: 在日历中支持闰月的概念，在某个特定的月份之后或在每一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法返回一个数字，介于 1 和 13，该值指示指定的日期与关联的月份。</xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.
trans-unit.target: 如果一年中，在第八个和第 9 个月之间存在闰月<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法闰第八个月的 9 和 10 第 9 个月的第八个月份返回 8。</xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 每一年。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: The return value is always 0 because the <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> type does not support the notion of a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 返回值始终是 0 因为<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>类型不支持闰月这一概念。

trans-unit.source: year or era is outside the range supported by the type.
trans-unit.target: year或era超出了支持的范围类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>中返回的月份

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示在指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>月份

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of months in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中指定年份中的月数。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: The return value is always 12.
trans-unit.target: 返回值始终是 12。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns the week of the year that includes the date in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回包括指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>中的日期的年份的某一周

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to determine the number of weeks in the year by setting the `time` parameter to the last day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于通过设置确定的年份中的周数`time`年份的最后一天的参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains culture-specific values that can be used for the `rule` and `firstDayOfWeek` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性包含可用于的区域性特定值`rule`和`firstDayOfWeek`参数。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> contains the default <xref:System.DayOfWeek> value that represents the first day of the week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A><xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>包含<xref:System.DayOfWeek>表示特定区域性，使用日历周的第一天的值在<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A><xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>中指定</xref:System.DayOfWeek>的默认</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> contains the default <xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule> value that defines a calendar week for a specific culture, using the calendar specified in the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A><xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>包含<xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule>的值，它定义的特定区域性，使用日历一个日历周<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A><xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>中指定</xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule>的默认</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.CalendarWeekRule%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, in <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A> method for January 1 returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>、<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A>的 1 月 1 日的方法返回 1。</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.GetWeekOfYear%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule> values that defines a calendar week.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule>定义一个日历周的值。</xref:System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.DayOfWeek> values that represents the first day of the week.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:System.DayOfWeek>这些值表示一周的第一天。</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: A 1-based integer that represents the week of the year that includes the date in the time parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示包括中的日期的年份的某一周的基于 1 的整数 time 参数。

trans-unit.source: time or firstDayOfWeek is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: time或firstDayOfWeek超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- rule is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: -rule不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>中的年份

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>读取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份中的指定<xref:System.DateTime>。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中指定的日期是否为闰日。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 闰年日语日历中对应于为公历日历中的相同闰年。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 闰年公历日历中定义为公历年份整除的由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的公历年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰日是仅在闰年中发生了一天。

trans-unit.source: For example, the 29th day of Nigatsu (February) is the only leap day.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Nigatsu （年 2 月） 29 日是唯一的闰日。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 31 之间的整数，表示日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的日期是闰日，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- day is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-day超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified month in the specified year in the specified era is a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定年份中的指定的月份是否为闰月。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 闰年日语日历中对应于为公历日历中的相同闰年。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 闰年公历日历中定义为公历年份整除的由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的公历年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰月是仅在闰年中发生的整月。

trans-unit.source: The Japanese calendar does not have any leap months.
trans-unit.target: 日本历没有闰月。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，除非由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定的年份是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: Leap years in the Japanese calendar correspond to the same leap years in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 闰年日语日历中对应于为公历日历中的相同闰年。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a Gregorian year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 闰年公历日历中定义为公历年份整除的由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外。

trans-unit.source: However, Gregorian years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的公历年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的年是闰年，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest date and time supported by the current <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取最新的日期和时间受当前<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> type, which is equivalent to the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最新的日期和时间受<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>类型，等效于的那一刻年 12 月 31 日公元 9999 年

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the current <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取最早的日期和时间由当前支持<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The earliest date supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar> class is September 8, 1868 C.E., in the first year of the Meiji era.
trans-unit.target: 支持的最早日期<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>类是年 9 月 8，为公元 1868，明治纪元的第一年。</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, date and time operations that use the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar> class throw an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> exception for dates before this date.
trans-unit.target: 通常，日期和时间使用的操作<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>类引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>异常在此日期之前的日期。</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>

trans-unit.source: However, some members, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.GetEra%2A> method, support dates from January 1, 1868 through September 7 in the year Meiji 1.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些成员，如<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.GetEra%2A>方法，在年明治 1 支持从 1868 年 1 月 1 日到年 9 月月 7 日的日期。</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.GetEra%2A>

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref> type, which is equivalent to the first moment of September 8, 1868 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最早的日期和时间受<xref href="System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar"></xref>类型，等效于公元 1868 年 9 月 8 日的那一刻

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> that is set to the specified date and time in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.DateTime>它被设置为指定的日期和指定纪元中的时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The ToDateTime method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date.
trans-unit.target: 都传递很有用，因为它可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.
trans-unit.target: 公历日期可以随后用于，例如，比较不同日历中的日期或在特定日历中创建等效的日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 从 1 到 12 的整数，表示的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 31 之间的整数，表示日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 23 that represents the hour.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 0 到 23 之间的整数，表示小时。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the minute.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 59 之间的整数，表示分钟。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the second.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 59 之间的整数，表示第二个。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 999 that represents the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 999 之间的整数，表示毫秒。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>，设置为指定的日期和时间以当前纪元。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- month is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-month超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- day is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-day超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or- hour is less than zero or greater than 23.
trans-unit.target: -或-hour小于零或大于 23。

trans-unit.source: -or- minute is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: -或-minute小于零或大于 59。

trans-unit.source: -or- second is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: -或-second小于零或大于 59。

trans-unit.source: -or- millisecond is less than zero or greater than 999.
trans-unit.target: -或-millisecond小于零或大于 999。

trans-unit.source: -or- era is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: -或-era超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax*> property to determine the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，通过使用<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax*>属性来确定相应的纪元。</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax*>

trans-unit.source: This method implements <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Because the year in the Japanese calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation always returns the value of the `year` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因为日语日历中的每年通常少于四位数，此实现始终返回的值`year`参数。

trans-unit.source: ToFourDigitYear supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: ToFourDigitYear 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。

trans-unit.source: However, a valid year is generally represented as two digits (less than 100).
trans-unit.target: 但是，有效年份通常表示为两个数字 (小于 100) 中。

trans-unit.source: Passing a two-digit year value causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> value representing the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 将两位数年份值传递会导致方法的值转换为一个四位数字值根据<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>值，该值表示相应的纪元。</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit value, or if it supplies zero or a negative value, ToFourDigitYear throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供了四位数字的值或者它会提供零或负值，ToFourDigitYear 引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An integer (usually two digits) that represents the year to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数 （通常两位数字），表示要转换的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，包含的四位数字表示形式 year 。

trans-unit.source: year is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: year超出所日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: This property implements <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实现<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Because the year in the Japanese calendar is typically less than four digits long, this implementation returns 99 by default and does not affect the return value of <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现因为日语日历中的每年通常少于四位数，默认情况下返回 99，不影响<xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>.</xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>的返回值

trans-unit.source: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中指定的值是小于 99。

trans-unit.source: -or- The value specified in a set operation is greater than 8011 (or <xref uid="langword_csharp_MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" name="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: -或-指定在集运算中的值大于 8011 (或<xref uid="langword_csharp_MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" name="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" href=""> </xref>)。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在集运算中，当前实例是只读的。
